title: Team recruiting adc and top [gold/plat]
body:
Hello as we prepare for season 9 we are seeking a top and an adc for our team.

**Team info:**
The team should be classified as semi-competitive.  Those looking to join should be competitive and wanting to work hard to improve with a current primary focus on the clash format.  We ask that you be mature and accept/provide constructive criticism.  Current members are plat and gold players and are seeking players in high gold or plat skill level.  We will use discord as our primary form of communication and for any changes to scheduling.

**Practice info/Expectations: **
Team practices will be Monday and Wednesday nights from 7-10 CST. Practices will be highly focused and consist of 3-4 games (flexq or scrims), vod reviews and discussions.  You will be responsible to put in the work on your own time of maintaining / expanding your champ pool, duoq with other team members to improve synergies etc.  

**Coaching:**
We will be bringing in coaches to conduct vod reviews to assist in us learning and improving synergies as a team.  We will also focus on comps and specific win conditions and strategies.  

Tryouts will begin this week and be conducted per our practice schedule :  Monday 1/21/2019 and Wednesday 1/23/2019, 7-10pm.  

If you are interested in trying out please leave the following information:

IGN:
Champ Pool:
Past 5s experience:
General Availability:

replies.body: Everyone who has responded to this point has been added in game to schedule a tryout day.
